statements.sql: select * from `product_categories` where `slug` = 'metallocherepica-gl-quadro-profi' limit 1

select count(*) as aggregate from `products` inner join `product_product_category` on `products`.`id` = `product_product_category`.`product_id` where `product_product_category`.`product_category_id` = 158 and `status_id` = 1

select *, `attribute_items`.`title` as `attribute_title`, `product_attributes`.`id` as `attribute_id`, `attribute_items`.`slug` as `attribute_code`, `option_items`.`title` as `option_title`, `option_items`.`slug` as `option_code` from `product_attributes` left join `option_items` on `option_item_id` = `option_items`.`id` left join `attribute_items` on `attribute_item_id` = `attribute_items`.`id` where exists (select * from `products` where `product_attributes`.`product_id` = `products`.`id` and exists (select * from `product_categories` inner join `product_product_category` on `product_categories`.`id` = `product_product_category`.`product_category_id` where `products`.`id` = `product_product_category`.`product_id` and `product_categories`.`id` = 158) and `status_id` = 1)

select `products`.*, `product_product_category`.`product_category_id` as `pivot_product_category_id`, `product_product_category`.`product_id` as `pivot_product_id` from `products` inner join `product_product_category` on `products`.`id` = `product_product_category`.`product_id` where `product_product_category`.`product_category_id` = 158
select * from `product_categories` where `product_categories`.`id` = 22 limit 1
select * from `product_categories` where `product_categories`.`id` = 2 limit 1
select * from `product_categories` where `parent_id` is null order by `sort` asc
select * from `product_categories` where `parent_id` is not null order by `sort` asc
select * from `post_categories` where `active` = 1 and `show_in_header` = 1

select `posts`.*, `post_category_post`.`post_category_id` as `pivot_post_category_id`, `post_category_post`.`post_id` as `pivot_post_id` from `posts` inner join `post_category_post` on `posts`.`id` = `post_category_post`.`post_id` where `post_category_post`.`post_category_id` in (1, 2, 3) and `active` = 1 and `show_in_header` = 1 order by `sort` desc
select * from `users` where `id` = 151 limit 1
select column_name as `column_name` from information_schema.columns where table_schema = 'rostov' and table_name = 'roles'

select `roles`.*, `model_has_roles`.`model_id` as `pivot_model_id`, `model_has_roles`.`role_id` as `pivot_role_id`, `model_has_roles`.`model_type` as `pivot_model_type` from `roles` inner join `model_has_roles` on `roles`.`id` = `model_has_roles`.`role_id` where `model_has_roles`.`model_id` = 151 and `model_has_roles`.`model_type` = 'App\Models\User'
select * from `product_categories` where `product_categories`.`parent_id` = 1 and `product_categories`.`parent_id` is not null
select * from `product_categories` where `product_categories`.`parent_id` = 2 and `product_categories`.`parent_id` is not null

select * from `post_categories` where `active` = 1 and `show_in_footer` = 1

select `posts`.*, `post_category_post`.`post_category_id` as `pivot_post_category_id`, `post_category_post`.`post_id` as `pivot_post_id` from `posts` inner join `post_category_post` on `posts`.`id` = `post_category_post`.`post_id` where `post_category_post`.`post_category_id` in (1, 2, 3) and `active` = 1 and `show_in_footer` = 1
select * from `product_categories` where `parent_id` is null
